metadata.name: Generate Code-Mapper Documentation
metadata.shortDescription: Generate technical project documentation using OLAF code-mapper analysis outputs.
metadata.description: Workflow skill that guides the user to run OLAF code-mapper foundation analysis and contextual reads, then uses the generated artifacts to produce structured technical project documentation.
objectives: Guide the user to run code-mapper foundation analysis on a target repository
Leverage structural and index outputs from code-mapper to understand the project
Drive contextual reads for key entry points in each application or tool
Generate a consistent technical documentation bundle for the analyzed repository
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Same class of models validated for core OLAF skills
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Python runtime capable of executing scripts/code-mapper/run.py and related utilities.
technical_requirements.platform_limitations: Assumes access to the target repository filesystem and ability to run Python scripts.

prompts.name: generate-code-mapper-docs
prompts.description: Main workflow prompt that orchestrates code-mapper analysis and documentation generation.
